 class OwlReader
extends javax.swing.JFrame

changeLanguage

private void changeLanguage(java.lang.String language,
                            java.lang.String country,
                            java.lang.String variant)
Changes the language. Will load the new resource-file, re-build the menu and reload DicmlRead-component.

Parameters:
language - the iso2-language code: is needed
country - specifiy a country if you want to, may be null if "variant" is null
variant - specifiy a language-variant if you want to, may be null
